short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power tool for Google Maps that helps well-organized travelers plan their next adventure!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turas.app is the ultimate companion to Google Maps to make it easier than even to plan your next trip.  Build your itinerary as you move around Google Maps, share your location with your travel companions, and easily visualize your trip on Google Maps!

- Create and plan trips from Google Maps
- See all of your trips as you're exploring in Google Maps
- Navigate your trips directly from Google Maps
- Add places to your itineraries directly from Google Maps
- Easily see where your trip companions are on Google Maps and easily move to their location
- Copy out your entire itinerary as text if you need to share it via text or email
- No need to copy and paste information between Google Maps and Google Docs or your Turas.app trip!

v1.20 Updates:
- Changed sort order on community trips so that the most recent trips show at the top
- Added UI to the plugin icon to load into Google Maps to make it more intuitive

v1.19 Updates:
- Fixed small copy mistake on the dialog for creating a new trip
- Settings now auto-save (no need to click Save button when changing settings)

v1.18 Updates:
- Add trip companions directly from the extension.
- The Turas.app extension panel remembers the state (floating button or open panel).  You must disable the setting "Expand Turas extension by default" in the Settings panel
- Moved the bottom buttons in the trip day listing to a fixed position to it's easier to access
- Scroll down when a new day is added to the trip

v1.17 Updates:
- Fix a minor bug with the routing whereby the search name was not used and the display name was used.

v1.16 Updates:
- The selected/active place has a background color to make it more visible
- Added the option to rename places; the original name from Maps is kept for search purposes

v1.15 Updates:
- Updated the sort order of the trips so that trips with the closest start date show up at the top

v1.14 Updates:
- Added placeholder for empty days to make drag/drop easier

v1.13 Updates:
- Fixed formatting of the trip UID to match web app
- Fixed display of link text in the community stories to display links

v1.12 Updates:
- Added toggle so that you can choose to explicitly only load the place when you click "Add to Turas"
- Added search feature for places in your itinerary (turns on when there are more than 2 days and 12 places)

v1.11 Updates:
- Fixed an issue locating the place when Google Maps shows a listing of places

v1.10 Updates:
- Minor bug fix

v1.9 Updates:
- Improved detection of place for different languages
- Added domain support for several top level TLDs (.dk, .de, etc. -- please leave a message if yours is missing!)
- Added support for storing a link to the first image for the place and options for controlling behavior on hover of the place (show image or not)

v1.8 Updates:
- Added option to update place icon, color, budget, and confirmation
- UI cleanup on community stories

v1.7 Updates:
- Discover trips from others in the community!

v1.6 Updates:
- Pausing your location updates pauses for all trips in session and clears your location
- Loading a trip will let you pick up where you left off an load into wherever you were last
- Copy your entire itinerary as text; perfect for emails or chat!

v1.5 Updates:
- Place icon and color picker condensed
- Reorganized settings
- Added compatibility for Firefox

v1.4 Updates:
- Minor UI fixes

v1.3 Updates:
- Fixed issue with drag/drop over the notes
- Added selection of trip start date
- Softer colors on chips for tags and days

v1.2 Updates:
- Consistent headers
- Colored border on expansion

v1.1 Updates:
- Added intro guide
- Fixed login redirect to correct URL
- You can now add trips from the extension.

v1.0 ðŸŽ‰ Updates:
- Share your Google Maps view with your trip companions!
- Lots of options to customize the UI and make it more dense!

v0.19 Updates:
- Drag/drop reordering!
- Added icons and tags for days
- Added routing of all day places
- Added options to control the initial state of the day notes
- Buttons to expand/collapse all days
- Option to view archived trips as well

v0.18 Updates:
- Added sync to Google Calendar
- Added FAQ and contact buttons
- Edit name and color for days
- Add days
- Delete days

v0.17 Updates:
- Notes for days
- Improved authentication flow so no need to sign in again
- Better density in the UI

v0.16 Updates:
- Delete any place
- Option to pick icon
- Option to pick color

v0.15 Updates:
- Fixed issue with fonts
- Improved login flow
- Added notifications
